page.title: 14ECOLOGY
page.content: THE AREA IS PRIMARILY RURAL AND PROVIDES A VARIETY OF ENVIRONMENTS FOR WILD LIFE BOTH FLORA AND FAUNA.THERE IS WOODLAND,HEATHLAND,GRASSLAND,MARSH- LAND,CULTIVATED LAND AND THE SEA AND BEACH. ALL OF THESE HABITATS ARE READILY ACCESSIBLE AS THE AREA IS WELL PROVIDED WITH FOOTPATHS WHICH ARE REASONABLY WELL MAINTAINED BY THE LOCAL COUNCILS. WALKERS,BIRDWATCHERS AND ARTISTS FIND MUCH OF INTEREST. BEING SITUATED WHERE THE PENINSULA IS NARROW, THE WEATHER CAN BE UNPREDICTABLE AND MAY VARY OVER QUITE SHORT DISTANCES.STRONG WINDS BLOWING FOR SEVERAL DAYS CAN BE UNCOMFORTABLE. FOG AND SEA MISTS ARE NOT UNCOMMON. THERE IS NO INDUSTRIAL POLLUTION AND IT IS A PLEASANT PLACE TO LIVE.
